name: DOOMSDAY CITY
description:
Armageddon is arriving!

As the only city left as the last safe haven for the citizens of Earth, you are left with the key to the chair of the  executioner. Decide which buildings to construct with the already very limited available spaces for the ever increasing amount of asylum seekers that will eventually face their unfortunate fate if they will not be allowed to enter the city. 

The choice is yours! The future of humanity resides in your hand.
